sourcesContent:
import Vue from 'vue'
import Router from 'vue-router'
import Home from './views/Home.vue'
import About from './views/About.vue'
import Login from './views/Login.vue'
import Main from './views/Main.vue'
import NotFound from './views/NotFound.vue'
import Padd from './views/ProductAdd.vue'
import Plist from './views/ProductList.vue'
import Stat from './views/Stat.vue'
import Ulist from './views/UserList.vue'
Vue.use(Router)  //=><script src="vue-router.js">

export default new Router({
  routes: [
    {path: '/',component:Login},
    {path:"/login",component:Login},
    {path:"/main",component:Main,children:[
        // {path:"",component:Stat},
        {path:"stat",component:Stat},
        {path:"ulist",component:Ulist},
        {path:"plist",component:Plist},
        {path:"padd",component:Padd}
    ]},
    {path:"/*",component:NotFound}
  ]
})
